uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.windows

Interface ExtendedUser32

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.sun.jna.AltCallingConvention, com.sun.jna.Library, com.sun.jna.win32.StdCall, com.sun.jna.win32.StdCallLibrary, com.sun.jna.platform.win32.User32, com.sun.jna.platform.win32.WinDef, com.sun.jna.platform.win32.WinUser

    public interface ExtendedUser32
extends com.sun.jna.platform.win32.User32
    Partial implementation of the Win32 User API.

      • IsZoomed

        boolean IsZoomed(com.sun.jna.platform.win32.WinDef.HWND hWnd)
        Is the window zoomed (maximised) or not?
        Parameters:
        hWnd - native window handle
        Returns:
        true if the window is zoomed; false if it is not
